document_data.name: Plague of Terror
document_data.mainbody: The '''Plague of Terror''' was a [[disease]] that struck [[Calimport]] ''circa'' {{Yearlink|-4770}}.
document_data.Effects: Afflicted individuals were driven mad by hallucinations of their fears and enemies.
document_data.History: Mysteriously, the plague impacted Calimport and only Calimport. Parts of the inner city as well as the entire waterfront were destroyed in a fire after a number of infected dockworkers hallucinated an attack by giant sea monsters.
